title: Dear LK: My son is upset his brother didn't make him best man. Should I intervene?
description: A mother debates whether she should talk to the groom about the issue. Catherine Newman, an etiquette columnist for Real Simple magazine, gives her advice.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
